product1.name: Nokia lumia 1520
product1.Text: The Nokia Lumia 1520 is powered by 2.2GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 processor and it comes with 2GB of RAM.

product3.name: Samsung galaxy s6
product3.Text: The Samsung Galaxy S6 is powered by 1.5GHz octa-core Samsung Exynos 7420 processor and it comes with 3GB of RAM. The phone packs 32GB of internal storage cannot be expanded.
